Text:
John Yudkin's ultra-rare book "Pure, White and Deadly" is available here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7359846/John_Yudkin_-_Pure__White_and_Deadly_(1972__Revised_1988_Edition

First part contains the answer... still this guy makes two more parts blabbering about saturated fats... and traffic lights.
CBS 60 Minutes 2012.04.01 made a program about sugars specifically - very good source of knowledge... can't be found at piratebay, sadly.
